The University of Washington Student Newspaper Wednesday October  

News

UW researchers discover new Alzheimers gene Ryan Sherman

In one of the many labs on campus that focuses its research on Alzheimers Cherie Singer facing and Pam McMillan discuss the difficulty of isolating a particular DNA fragment from an agarose gel PERIOD Once isolated the fragment will be amplified in the lab and used as a probe to detect genes in the human brain that may be involved in the progression of Alzheimers PERIOD
